paragraphs.body: The Painted Lady statuettes are small statues and sculptures found throughout ${link_0} that depict its guardian ${link_1}, the ${link_2}. After witnessing an unforeseen return of the entity, numerous villagers erected statuettes of varying sizes across the town in honor of her contributions.
paragraphs.text: The Painted Lady statuettes are small statues and sculptures found throughout Jang Hui that depict its guardian spirit, the Painted Lady. After witnessing an unforeseen return of the entity, numerous villagers erected statuettes of varying sizes across the town in honor of her contributions.

paragraphs.body: After hearing about myths of the Painted Lady, ${link_0} secretly assumed her persona and helped the villagers of Jang Hui by ${link_1} them and giving them ${link_2} at night. Katara also modeled her clothes and makeup after the statuettes displayed around the village.
paragraphs.text: After hearing about myths of the Painted Lady, Katara secretly assumed her persona and helped the villagers of Jang Hui by healing them and giving them food at night. Katara also modeled her clothes and makeup after the statuettes displayed around the village.

paragraphs.body: When the ${link_0} went out to buy food from ${link_1}'s store, the owner explained how a spirit visited them during the night and he took out a small statuette of the spirit. A large, full-size statue was also raised in the town square.
paragraphs.text: When the group went out to buy food from Xu's store, the owner explained how a spirit visited them during the night and he took out a small statuette of the spirit. A large, full-size statue was also raised in the town square.
